column5: Project Description
Schiller Woods - 2nd new comfort station near grove #10, est. $350k
Camp Shabbona - New office/store to replace temporary trailer.
Wampum Lake - New comfort station, est. $350k
Capital outlays for HVAC, electrical and plumbing equipment replacements, building materials & other capital equipment.
Asphalt patching, paving & landscape equipment.  2020: trucks for asphalt transport (2 @ $85k), other ($50k).
Durable landscape materials& equipment for special landscape installations

Trail repairs - annual maintenance to 155-mile paved trail system: extended repairs on 1/30th or 5.17 mi./yr @ $140k/mi.=$723k/yr + patching of 0.3% or 0.47 mi./yr @ $250k/mi. = $118k/yr.  2020: Allocate all $841k to Paul Douglas & Tinley Creek repairs, above.
Trail repairs - annual maintenance to unpaved trails District-wide:  $200k for trail repair + $260k for bridge repair based on past 2012-2017 spending over 5 years + 2 years deferred maintenance.

Central Garage HVAC & Energy Efficiency Upgrades . 2020:  vehicle exhaust + window replacement + masonry repairs (est. $111k + $___), audit svcs ($5k/yr); 2021 :  Trombe wall and make-up air system (est. $100k), audit ($5k); 2022: high-speed OH doors (est. $11k).
George Dunne Golf Course - Garage/Office/Residence (#403, est. $335k); Dunne Garage (#404, est. $70k)
Camp Dan Beard garage renovation - A/E svcs - data/electric service upgrades
Spring Creek/Horizon Farm trail improvement plan  - A/E inspection & design specification services for site improvements (parking, drainage, restoration, trails).
Misc. Projects & Expenses - permit and utility fees; emergency repairs, FF&E, change orders.

Picnic Shelter Repairs - 2019 deferred: structural repairs @ 2 locations - Sauk Trail Woods Central - Grove 5 (est 40k) & Teason Woods (est 40k). 2020: structural repairs @ 5 locations - Busse Woods groves (#24, #17, #18, funded by $125k Nicor grant),  Brezina Woods #2 (est. $42k) & Schiller #14 (est. $37k).  2021: structural repairs at Midlothian Meadows groves #1, #2 & #3, Busse #32 & #27, Bunker Hill #3, Harms #5, Kings Grove #1 and other groves. 2022: roof replacement - 20 shelters (est. $500k); 2023-2024: misc repairs.
Chick Evans Golf Course - "mission critical" systems, including irrigation system, drainage, bunkers and cart path repairs   NGF est. $2.9M-$3.7M.
Trail repairs - misc emergency repairs to paved and unpaved trails.
Salt Creek Resource Management Div.- office/training room renovation, with some in-house labor & new restroom addn (est. $650k).
Bridge & Culvert repairs at 8 locations on trails in SW and South zones (FP111, 73, 76, 78, 80, 82, 97 & 98).
Caldwell Woods Warming Shelter Renovation - conversion to "welcome and wellness center" to provide for year-round indoor recreation and information hub, subject to A/E design & state grant funds.
Camp Reinberg and Dan Beard garages demolition & relocation of electric utilities.

Misc. A/E Design + consulting services - increases, materials testing, small jobs < $25k including Des Plaines RT South Extn-Brookfield cost share ($16k).Villa Santa Maria Historic Survey ($10k). Caldwell Woods stair removal & replacement (est. $15k).
Dan Ryan Woods South - new Nature Center incl. soft costs,  subject to cost-sharing with City of Chicago & Chicago PD.
George Dunne Golf Course Banquet Facility - new 10,000 s.f. banquet center (est. $3M).
New Vehicle Garages at 4 locations @ $1.1M ea. 2021: Tinley Creek LM and RM divisions and 2024: NW Division and Kings Grove RM.

A/E Services - Building Exterior Repair Inspections & Specifications at various locations Districtwide.  Roof, window and door replacments and masonry repairs. 2020: Glen Grove Stables riding arena (est. $15k). 2021-2024: $100k/yr for new inspections & specs.

HVAC & MEP consultant services - inspections & replacement specs -  2020: inspection of golf support buildings & design specs for clubhouses (est. $69k).  2021:  design specs for Police & LM support locations (est. $65k).
Skokie Boathouse & Bathrooms - new buildings on Tower Road, est. $4.6M, subject to major grant support
Water filtration systems for well water - 2 test locations (McGinnis Field Station & Tinley Creek LM HQ). Total of 20 sites with need.
Chicago Portage National Historic Site - visitors center & bathrooms.
Picnic Grove Well & Handpump Repairs/Replacements - subject to assessment in 2020.
Sagawau ELC Farmhouse - new addition with ADA restoom (est. $250k).
Trailside Museum nature play enhancements - stone council ring
Pre-demolition abatement services - at various locations, est. $100k/yr, 2020-2022, transfer from reserves.  Reduced ongoing need after 2022.
FPD General Headquarters – Headquarters Office (prelim. est. $17k)
McGinnis Slough connection - LaGrange Rd & SW Highway to Wolf Rd & 135th (2.5 miles).  2022: phase I.  2023: phase II (20%*$75k).
Environmental inspections, oversight of abatement (award to EGSL in 2019 for up to $150k for 3 yrs)
Sagawau Canyon stair repairs - in-house by Facilities Dept.
South & Southwest gateway site signs: 2020: Sand Ridge Campus wayfinding signs (est. $175k, 50% OSLAD grant ). 2021: Eggers Woods ($150k); 2022-2023: Oak Forest ($225k), Sauk Trail ($150k)
Sign replacement Countywide.  Replacement of old wood signs with new preserve signs.  New trailhead information signs (potential grant support).
Des Plaines River Trail rebuilding - Irving Park Ave to Touhy (est. $11.5M), subject to 80% fed grant funding
Tinley Creek trail connection - 167th & Central to Flossmoor & Cicero (5 miles).  phase I engineering; phase II engineering (20%*$150k); phase III engineering (20%*$125k) pending grant.
Centennial Bike Trail final link.  20% x total cost estimate of $6,987,000 subject to phase I & II engineering in 2023.
Miscellaneous Site Amenities - emergency repairs or replacements, permits, change orders, small jobs, other site work
Restoration - Districtwide managed by Resource Management Dept.
Energy efficiency upgrades - including LED lighting replacements, wireless remote control systems and other energy saving building upgrades
Fleet - new and replacement vehicles & other heavy equipment.
Powderhorn greenway site development improvements (trail, signs, fencing), est. $104,000.  Future habitat restoration.
Major Taylor Trail - South Extension in Whistler Woods.  Potential new loop trail at southern terminus.  Preliminary cost estimate: $1,636,115.
Torrence Ave Road Connections.  Potential pedestrian bridge over Torrence Ave - est. $3.25M, subject to phase 1 & II engineering and 80% grant
Camp Kiwanis - new equestrian camp subject to state capital bill. 20 RV/trailer sites and utility improvements.
Chicago Portage -  overflow parking and ADA path upgrades
New "green fleet" vehicles & equipment - electric, hybrid, biofuel, propane vehicles/equipment funded by 2019 bond issue.
Powderhorn Lake & Marsh Outlet improvements funded by federal (NOAA) grant.  2020: engineering (est. $100k); 2021:  construction (est. $875k).
Torrence Ave Ped Bridge - Feasibility Study - A/E design services, est. $150k
Northwest Division - Spring Creek Greenway - 165 Algonquin Rd Site Development - newly acquired site.  Driveway, parking, trail & signage improvements (est. $77k)
Major Taylor Trail - new wayfinding and interpretive signs - subject to grant funding
Busse Woods Preserves - large-scale landscape restoration funded by Nicor license tree mitigation fees + additional $400k donation
Sand Ridge Campus - Restoration work to improve site lines - 50% OSLAD funding
Emergency Callbox Replacements on trails,  cost TBD after inspections in 2020.
Camp Dan Beard - Phase 2 - new family campground with tent & RV sites south of existing group campground
Crabtree Nature Center - A/E consulting/design for new exhibits and nature play enhancements
Beaubien Woods site improvements - A/E design for program shelter, other gathering space site improvements, interpretive signs and trail connection (20%*est. $900k construction cost).
Reimagining Public Golf in Southern Cook County - A/E design, est. $120k (15% * $8M)
Torrence Ave Ped Bridge - Feasibility Study - A/E design services, est. $150k
Solar Field at Central Maintenance Compound (Net Zero Upgrades) -  2023 (phase 5) consulting for solar field.
Camp Dan Beard - A/E services for Phase 2 Family Camp, est.  $1M (20% * $5M construction cost)

Exterior Repair Needs - roof, masonry, exterior walls, window & door replacement.  2020: masonry repairs at Crabtree NC, Glen Grove Stables -chimney + 3 Salt Creek RM buildings (est. $289k).  2021-2024: masonry repairs & new windows at Glen Grove Stables Riding Arena, Central Maint. Compound buildings, Indian Boundary LM Office/Residence & other locations identified in 2020.
George Dunne Banquet Facility - A/E design

Central Maintenance Garage HVAC system replacement - 2020 (Phase 2): vehicle exhaust + window replacement (est. $550k); 2021 (phase 3): Trombe wall and make-up air pre-heat system (est. $500k); 2022 (Phase 4): 3 high speed overhead doors (est. $75k); 2023 (Phase 5), 50,000 solar field in New Amenities.
I&M/Centennial Bike Trail - Willow Springs Rd to Chicago Portage - phase I & II engineering
Dan Ryan Woods - South - new nature center - A/E design, est. $1.5 million (15% * $10M construction cost)

Priority HVAC Equipment Replacements - GHQ Liebert (est $50k), Trailside HVAC (est $35k) & Sand Ridge NC (est. $55k). 2020: public golf course clubhouse locations (CE, EB, GD & RO, est. $170k, incl. $100k from BCG); 2021: replacements at support locations (Palos LM Div + 3 Police locations (est. $325k).   2022-2024: more limited replacements until 2028.
Skokie Boathouse & Bathrooms - A/E services for new buildings on Tower Road, subject to grant support,  est.  $600k (13% * $4.6M)
Central Compound -  replace fire alarm system (in lieu of GC roofs)
Central Police (1 Aloha) HQ - vestibule for security screening.
Major Taylor Trail - new wayfinding and interpretive signs
Central Maintenance Garage solar field - 50,000 sf solar field (est. $2.1M) to achieve Net Zero goal, subject to feasibility study

New entrance, wayfinding & information signs, North & Northwest:  2020: Caldwell/Bunker Hill ($225k); Spring Creek/Horizon Farm signs ($50k). 2021: Busse Woods gateway signs ($225k) and add'l new Spring Creek/Horizon Farm trail signs.
Sand Ridge Campus - nature play area (est. $70k, partial OSLAD grant).  New fishing outcroppings included in trail package, above.
GHQ Energy Audit  (est. $95k)
Beaubien Woods driveway & parking lot renovation - A/E design, update of 2014 concept design.
Paul Douglas trail repair: address flooding along Freeman Road, funded by MFT grant from CCDOTH
Salt Creek Resource Management - A/E design of renovation and restroom addition  (est. $100k, similar to Salt Creek LM + soil borings)

Access & drainage improvements -new paths & drainage at public facilities (camps, comfort stations & picnic groves).  2020:  Camp Bullfrog paths (est. $250k), Whealan Pool sidewalks +  picnic grove access & drainage (est. $200k, including $40k St. Paul Woods grant).
Caldwell Warming Shelter renovation - A/E design services (est. $180k, 20%*$900k construction estimate).
Carl Hansen Woods - new comfort station, est. $320k
Des Plaines Bike Trail - UP Railroad Crossing - Construction; potential match from RR safety grant $1,466,516 and CMAQ 1,648,242.  Estimated Local Share $195,536 + $216,525 = $412,061.
New Picnic Shelters  at high demand or underserved locations:  Plank Rd Meadows, Thatcher Woods, Spring Creek, Wampum Lake @ $250k each.
New Landscape Maintenance Office/Garage building at Horizon Farm @ $1M
Joe Louis Golf Course - clubhouse repairs ($36k) and new outing pavilion ($100k).  NGF estimates.
Busse Reservoir - new canoe/kayak launch,  IDNR Boat Access grant ($80k), 2019 bond ($61,370). Additional ADA upgrades in design.
40 Acre Woods/Swallow Cliff underpass & related Yellow trail improvements (IDNR Recreation Trails grant = 80% or $200k).

Picnic Shelter Repairs - rounds 3 & 4 at various locations. Round 3 - 2019 bond-funded locations: Sauk Trail (est. $40k) + Teason's Woods (est. $67k) - bid each separately in 2019 Round 4 - 2020 funded (inclding $68k bond balance): Brezina Woods grove #2 (est. $42k), Midlothian Meadows grove #3 (est. $43k), + Midlothian Meadows #2 (est. $30k) +  Midlothian Meadows #1 (est. $29k) + Schiller Woods grove #14 (est. $37k) +  Round 4A Nicor funded: Busse Woods grove #24  (est. $55k).  + Busse Forest #17 (est. $37k)  + Busse Lake Biesner Rd. #32 (est. $33k) = $125k
Spring Lake/Horizon Farm site improvements (incl. multi-use trail and other trailhead improvements), subject to further planning & engineering
Tinley Creek Division - Villa Santa Maria Site Development - access, parking, trail & signage improvements at newly acquired site. Acquisition grant requirement (est. $350k)
Billy Caldwell Golf Course Concession Building roof repair/replacement.  (Indian Boundary Clubhouse roof repair awarded in 2019 currently in process.)

2020: Sagawau ELC Farmhouse - flat roof replacement - back addition (est. $20k); Plum Creek Comfort Station (est. $15k) Ottawa Trail (est. $22k) 2021:  garage/workshop renov. (est. $120k, include in Districtwide exterior package)
Billy Caldwell Golf Course - Concession Building (Bldg. #39; est. $100k) (subject to inspection in 2018)
Hot mix asphalt, crack sealant, drainage/sewer materials.  2020: Tollway grant for  I&M Canal Trail patching ($35k).  Material cost expected to double in 2021.

Demolition.  Various locations, est. $1M/yr, 2020-2022. Reduced ongoing need starting in 2023 after clearing backlog (est. $100k/yr.).  Some suburban locations by Sheriff's Office, some in-house disposal cost.
A/E Structural engineering pool - task orders to pre-qualified pool, est. $25k/yr.
Cost estimating - task orders to pre-qualified pool.
Dam & shoreline repairs on fishing lakes - Phase 3:  Army Corps locations TBD, including ADA fishing access improvements, after inspections in 2020 & design in 2021.
CM/OR services - water main work in the Tinley Preserves funded by Oak Lawn Water Consortium (NTE $200k) and in St Paul Woods by Morton Grove-Niles Water Comn (NTE $63k)
Doty Avenue - reconstruction of roughly 0.5 miles of public access road serving Beaubien Woods, est. $440,000, funded by MFT grant from CCDOTH.

Des Plaines Bike Trail - Irving Ave to Touhy - Major Rebuild - Phase II engineering services, est. $80k local cost share based on $800k total cost (7% x $11.2M construction cost) and cost sharing with at least one partner.
Beaubien Woods - Doty Avenue partial road reconstruction - Ph 2 engineering services (est. $30k).
River Oaks Golf Course - key infrastructure repair such as drainage, lake-bank collapses, two bridges and irrigation systems.  NGF est. $2.7-$3M
A/E Services - Dam inspections; dam & shoreline repairs on lakes, including ADA access path upgrades.  A/E design in 2021 (est. $175k)
Dan Ryan/ Major Taylor Trail improvements - Ph 2 engineering services, est. $84k (7%* $1.2M construction cost). Phase I in process (CCDOTH award to HNTB).
Access road and parking area repaving & reconstruction at high priority locations: roughly 60 lots currently in poor condition, subject to motor fuel tax grant funding through CCDOTH.
Major Taylor Trail - Whistler Woods - New River Overlook .  New scenic overlook south of bridge & art mural. Subject to grant funding, est. $140k.
Major Taylor Trail - new Signs & Connections, est. $1.1 M)
Trail Safety Crossing Improvements - allocation for local match for additions  to County or Illinois road improvement projects.
Caldwell Woods site improvements - A/E design for possible fitness stairs and nature play area, subject to design in 2021 (est. $400k)
Rolling Knolls - Nature play area pad (est. $25k).
Energy Audits  & Sustainability consulting services - high energy use locations TBD
Poplar Creek Trail Spur at Shoe Factory Road - with Hoffman Estates & Hoffman Estates Park District.  10% cost share -payment to Village
Water pump replacement systems - engineering svcs.  Replacement of picnic grove hand pumps subject to assessment in 2020.
Oak Forest Heritage Preserve - Midlothian Meadows trail connection.  Total cost est. $80k.  Local match: $17,710.
Joe Louis Golf Course - high priority irrigation system and pump house replacement ($1.4M) and drainage improvements detention and siphon systems  (NGF est. cost $1.2M + $350k).
Villa Santa Maria - site development -  new picnic shelter (est. $150k), following parking lot improvements in 2022 (see above).
Tinley Creek Ravines - Restoration work funded by Oak Lawn water line mitigation funding
Eggers Woods - site improvement design, subject to vision planning in 2020.
Sand Ridge Nature Center - Fabrication and installation of interpretive exhibits
Tinley Creek Trail Repairs - repairs to 4.6 miles in poor condition (est. $870k) funded by MFT grant from CCDOTH.

Salt Creek Landscape Maintenance Div. 2020: demo of existing office bldg and construction of smaller new office bldg with locker rooms & training room. 2021: replacement garage, similar but smaller than Central Compound vehicle storage garage (est. $750k, subject to pending A/E design currently in process).
Sand Ridge/Shabbona/Green Lake Campus - gravel walking trails, est. $225,000, fishing outcroppings ($80k) and fencing ($25k) 50% bond, 50% OSLAD grant.
Swallow Cliff - north - repairs to 1930s-era stairs, subject to reimbursement from Rebuild Illinois capital funds.
I&M Trail repairs, patching in 2020 funded by Illinois Tollway grant.  More significant repaving in 2023 as potential add to Tollway work in 2023.
I&M Trail - John Husar trailhead sign replacement funded by Illinois Tollway grant (est. $30k)
Beaubien Woods site improvements - gathering spaces (support for Field Museum plan), program shelter, site improvements, interpretive signs and trail connection (est. $1M).
Maple Lake East - mountain bike staging area trailhead amenities - new shelter with changing room facilities, funded in part by CAMBr grant.
Des Plaines Maintenance HQ - heated garage roof repairs (FID #558), est. $50k. (subject to inspection in 2018)
Indian Boundary Golf Course -  Pumphouse (#680) roof replacement (leaking) (est. $40k) & Clubhouse (FID #95) (est. $100k, subject to inspection in 2018)
River Trail Nature Center - workshop/garage roof repairs & other renovation (est. $250k).  OUT TO BID
Des Plaines Bike Trail - UP Railroad Crossing.  2020: Ph. 2 Engineering (est. $220k, 20% match).  2021: Construction management engineering (est. $70k 20% share).

Caldwell Woods Site Amenities - new ADA access path between Whealan Pool and renovated warming shelter building,  Repaving and ADA upgrades to access road and parking areas near Whealan Pool (est. $370k).  New information kiosk (est. $50k).  Removal and replacement of concrete sledding hill stairs (middle stairs and railings, est. $75k).
Engineering services for transportation improvements Countywide. Access road, trail & parking area repaving & reconfiguration funded by CCDOTH grant.
New site identification, information and wayfinding signs Districtwide
Crabtree Nature Center - updated interpretive exhibits & nature play enhancements
